section.name: What Is James Mailbox?
section.p: A library providing a flexible Mailbox storage accessible by mail (imap, pop3, smtp,...) and other protocols.
The mailbox library supports different persistence mecanisms: MailDir, Database (via JPA) and JCR.

section.name: Status
section.p: The API has been tested, but is susceptible to evolve.

section.name: Mailbox In James Server
section.p: JAMES Server 3 uses the Maibox(using this library). A backport to JAMES Server 2.3.2 would require a volunteer.

section.name: Develop with James Mailbox
section.p: Just read the source code page to get more information on how to develop on James Mailbox.
